      • scanList

        public int scanList​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> scoreList,
                    int score)
        Read txt file into an arrayList and Scan it. If player create a new record, return its rank.
        Parameters:
        scoreList - - An arrayList to store high scores
        score - - the score of this game
        Returns:
        the rank of new record or -1

        Show a screen to allow player to enter his name Add new high score into arrayList
        Parameters:
        root - - group root
        scoreList - - An arrayList
        score - - the score of this game
        flag - - the rank of new record or -1
        currentLevel - - the level when game ended
